translations: n.[机]牛头刨床；塑造者；塑形衣（sharper 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Shapers: Both would want their own shapers.
sentences.translation: 造型师：两位都希望用自己的造型师。

sentences.sentence: I want to hear the voice of the young global shapers and millennial.
sentences.translation: 我希望听到年轻人的声音，听到千禧一代的声音。

sentences.sentence: New Scientist brings you five of the most interesting future-movers and shapers.
sentences.translation: 《新科学家》选出了5个最有趣的未来行动家和塑造家。
